definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

pinyin: guo2 ji4 zhan4 zheng1 zui4 fa3 ting2

definition: International Court of Justice in The Hague

sentences.english: The ICC must decide whether to indict the suspects.
sentences.chinese: 国际刑事法庭必须决定是否起诉这些嫌犯。

sentences.english: Judge Orie had the curtains drawn while Mladic was taken out of court.
sentences.chinese: 当姆拉迪奇被带出法庭时，法官奥列将帘子拉下。

sentences.english: He was found guilty by the court-martial and sentenced to imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 军事法庭判他有罪并判他坐牢。

sentences.english: J. Simpson's codefendants were in a Las Vegas court today.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森的共同被告今日走上拉斯维加斯法庭。

sentences.english: The accused begged for the court's understand.
Mr. Alvarez has not yet been called to testify.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔瓦雷斯尚未被法庭传唤作证。

sentences.english: Court acquits her of indecent assault.
In the United States, the emphasis on individual autonomy usually results in stigmatization of the accused offender.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，强调个人主义，通常会导致罪犯被告上法庭。

sentences.english: The hecklers were banished from the courtroom.
Eg . If you go on ill-treating your wife like this , you will be taken to court .
sentences.chinese: 如果你再这样对待你的妻子，你就会被送上法庭。

sentences.english: We court risk more avidly as teens than at any other time.
sentences.chinese: 法庭审讯青少年的冒险行为比其他任何时候都多。

sentences.english: He was taken away to the court to be cross-examined.
sentences.chinese: 他被带到法庭上去询问了。

sentences.english: The next date in the case at New York Supreme Court before Judge Michael Obus was set for July 18.
sentences.chinese: 纽约最高法庭就此案的下次开庭日期是7月18日。

sentences.english: They were there to examine the court's progress for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 这是他们第一次来到这里检查法庭的审判程序。

sentences.english: There was a prima facie case that a contempt of court had been committed.
sentences.chinese: 表面上看这是一宗藐视法庭的案件。

sentences.english: Four post-election trials have been held at Branch 15 of the Revolutionary Court in Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 选举后有四个审判是在德黑兰革命法庭第15科举行。

definition: to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
